page.title: 10Shopping In Hall Green
page.content: Many people shop at the Co-op Food-fair because it is local and convenient.It also gives free stamps to stick in a booklet.People like to shop at the CO-OP because it is friendly and cheap.It sells good quality products.It sells food beverages,household goods,toiletries and snacks. Many people use the corner shop on Copworth Drive because it sells other things that people want,such as news papers,sweets,tobacco and childrens games. Apart from food etc.the PostOffice gives a service to the public. It sells stamps, pays family allowances,widows pensions, state pensions,postal orders and national saving stamps.They now take bills and sell premium bonds.It is a usefull shop for local people.
